title.rendered: Yatra.com offers / coupon code: Amazing discounts On Domestic Flights

content.rendered:
You can book through Yatra.com to get up to Rs.2,500 OFF on your domestic flight booking. Hurry this offer is valid for limited period.

Promo Code: FREEFLY

Book your flight tickets with Yatra.com and get Amazing discounts On Domestic Flights

Terms and conditions:

  • Get up to Rs.2,500 off on domestic flights.
  • A minimum booking amount of Rs.2,000 required to avail the offer.
  • Offer is applicable on Desktop/Mobile site & APP (android & ios).
  • The offer is applicable on both one-way and round-trip flight booking.
  • Offer is not applicable on EMI payment option.
  • This offer is valid only on confirmed domestic flight bookings through Yatra only.
  • Each customer can use the code only ONCE during the offer period.
  • This offer cannot be exchanged or clubbed with any other offer running on the website.
  • The offer is not valid for Travel agents.
  • In case of refund, the discounted amount will be deducted from the total refund due.
  • Yatra reserves the right at any time without prior notice to add, alter, modify all or any of these terms and conditions or replace wholly or in part, this offer by any other offer, whether similar to this offer or not or to withdraw it altogether.
  • The decision of Yatra in all matters in connection with or incidental to this offer would be final and binding.
  • This offer cannot be exchanged for cash or any other value.
  • All standard terms and conditions mentioned on Yatra.com website would apply.
  • All disputes arising out of, or in connection with this offer shall be subject to exclusive jurisdiction of Court at Gurgaon.
